snippet: The Formula One driver Kimi Raikkonen said he had not been paid by Lotus this season and threatened to skip the final two races of the season in protest.
abstract: Formula One driver Kimi Raikkonen says he has not been paid by Lotus this season and threatens to skip the final two races of the season in protest.
lead_paragraph: The Formula One driver Kimi Raikkonen said he had not been paid by Lotus this season and threatened to skip the final two races of the season in protest.
